title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Mastering model choice: The 3-step Amazon Bedrock advantage (AIM391)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 掌握模型选择：Amazon Bedrock 的三步优势 (AIM391)
abstract: Unlock the full potential of Amazon Bedrock by learning how to choose the perfect foundation models for your unique use cases. This session reveals a powerful three-step framework used by industry leaders to navigate Amazon Bedrock's expansive model portfolio. Discover how to identify ideal model candidates, conduct rigorous data-driven evaluations, and optimize for production through strategic model combinations and fine-tuning. Also hear from CoinMarketCap, a leading source for real-time cryptocurrency market data, as they share real-world examples and practical evaluation techniques. Learn expert strategies for balancing performance, cost, and latency to make informed decisions that maximize your AI investments.
abstract_cn: 通过学习如何为您的独特用例选择完美的基础模型，释放Amazon Bedrock的全部潜力。本次会议揭示了行业领导者用于导航Amazon Bedrock广泛模型组合的强大三步框架。了解如何识别理想的候选模型、进行严格的数据驱动评估，以及通过战略性模型组合和微调来优化生产环境。还将听取CoinMarketCap（实时加密货币市场数据的领先来源）分享的真实案例和实用评估技术。学习平衡性能、成本和延迟的专家策略，以做出明智决策，最大化您的AI投资回报。
